manager.description:
# Autovoice manager
Use this interface to manage your autovoice channel.
By default, autovoice channels are unlimited, visible and open to everyone (except blocked members).
manager.footer: Autovoice channels are deleted when they get empty.

name.label: New channel name
name.description: Assign a new name to the channel.
name.title: Channel Name

limit.label: Channel limit
limit.description: Change the room user limit (0 to remove the limit)
limit.title: User Limit

collector.left_while_selecting: It looks like you left the channel while performing this action...
collector.no_longer_owner: It seems like you are no longer the owner of this room.

target_block.description: One or more of the members selected are being blocked by you or they have you on their blocklist!
target_block.title: Mutual restriction

collector.name: Your channel was renamed to **{{string}}**

limit.nan: You must provide a valid number (0 - 99).
limit.minimum_slots:
There are currently {{room_size}} members on your room, limit can not be less than that.
0 may be given to remove the limit.
limit.set: Your room has its limit set to {{limit}}.

hide.hidden:
Your channel is now hidden
Only you and trusted members can see this channel.
Members currently in the channel can see it too until they leave.

lock.locked:
Your channel is now locked.
Only you and trusted members can join and speak in this channel.
Members currently on the voice channel that are **NOT** trusted will lack permissions.

region.set: Your room region is now set to {{string}}.

trust.select_placeholder: Select users to be trusted and granted access.

untrust.select_placeholder: Select users to be untrusted and denied access.

collector.unblock: Unblocking someone doesn't grant them access to this channel, add them to trusted members.

claim.not_in_autovoice: You must be in an autovoice to do that!
claim.already_owner: You already own a room, you can't claim another one!
claim.owner_still_present: You can't claim a room when the owner is still there.
claim.success: You are now the owner of {{channel}}.

no_members.description: You have no one to transfer the ownership to!
no_members.title: You're the only one in the room

transfer.select_placeholder: Select a new owner from the room...

forbidden.not_voice_owner: You must be in your own autovoice room to do that!

fetch.room: Failed to fetch your room from database to discord, might no longer exist.

interface_embed.title: Looking for Group
interface_embed.description: Press the **LFG** button, select the channel to post in and complete the modal with what you are looking for!

value.active_posts: List currently active posts for this LFG
value.info: A quick guide on how to use this interface

empty.description: There is no active post at the moment.

info.description:
- Press the **LFG** and fill the modal that will open, with your post requirements and info.
- If you wish to see what rooms are open to join immediately, use the **Active Posts** button.
- **BUMP** and **Delete** are post-related buttons. By bumping, you are using your cooldown to re-post your currently active LFG.
- By pressing delete, you are removing your post from the channel.
info.footer: Do note that deleting your post won't refresh your cooldown.

lfg_button.success:
Your post has been sent in {{channel}}.
You can post again <t:{{cooldown}}:R>

bump_button.success:
Your post was bumped!
You can post or bump again <t:{{cooldown}}:R>
bump_button.no_active_post: You have no active post to bump!

delete_button.no_active_post: You have no active post to delete!

fetch_game.title: Mismatch between the collector and database
fetch_game.description: There was a problem while fetching the game row for this interface...

collector.game_missing_channels: It seems like this game has no LFG channels assigned to the system...
collector.bump_failed: Something went wrong and your post couldn't be bumped. Try using the interface instead after a minute.

post_builder.selected_channel: Failed to fetch the selected channel, report this to an admin.

modals.select_gamemode_label: Select the gamemode you're planning to play.
modals.slots_label: How many players are you looking for?

select_roles.label: Ask for specific roles.
select_roles.description: Select the roles you want in your post.

select_ranks.label: Ask for specific ranks.
select_ranks.description: Select the ranks you want in your post.

details.placeholder: Add your in-game name and anything you want the other players to know.
details.label: Additional info

invalid.slots: You must provide a valid number greater than 0.

common.action_on_cooldown:
This action is on cooldown!
Cooldown expires <t:{{cooldown}}:R>
common.button_inner_cooldown: You are pressing buttons too fast! <t:{{cooldown}}:R>

bad_word_usage.description: Bad word usage in the input given!
bad_word_usage.title: Blocked words detected

common.not_in_voice: You need to be in a voice channel to do that!
